Name: A1Range
Usage: Give it cell1 A1¬†and cell2¬†D4¬†to get the string range notation: "A1:D4"
Usage_Html: Give it cell1 A1¬†and cell2¬†D4¬†to get the string range notation: "A1:D4"

Name: SheetName
Usage: Extract sheet name from a a1cell, placed in another sheet of the current file.
Usage_Html: Extract sheet name from a a1cell, placed in another sheet of the current file.

Name: ImportRange_Array
Formula_Html: REDUCE(0, FILTER(sources&"ü¶ï"&ranges,sources<>""), LAMBDA(ini,v,if(ini=0,importrange(INDEX(SPLIT(v,"ü¶ï"),1),INDEX(SPLIT(v,"ü¶ï"),2)),{ini;importrange(INDEX(SPLIT(v,"ü¶ï"),1),INDEX(SPLIT(v,"ü¶ï"),2))})))
Usage: ImportRange ArrayFormula. Has 2 parameters: sources, ranges.
Usage_Html: ImportRange ArrayFormula. Has 2 parameters: sources, ranges.

Name: Substitutes_re
Usage: Regex Replace each element in list1 with the element of list2 in each text of list0
Usage_Html: Regex Replace each element in list1 with the element of list2 in each text of list0

Name: Substitutes
Usage: Substitute each element in list1 with the element of list2 in each text of list0
Usage_Html: Substitute each element in list1 with the element of list2 in each text of list0

Name: Substitutes_re2
Usage: Regex Replace values from delimited list1 with delimited list2 in texts from list0
Usage_Html: Regex Replace values from delimited list1 with delimited list2 in texts from list0

Name: Substitutes2
Usage: Substitutes values from delimited list1 with delimited list2 in texts from list0
Usage_Html: Substitutes values from delimited list1 with delimited list2 in texts from list0

Name: Append
Formula_Html: BYROW(text,LAMBDA(r,IF(r="",,JOIN(delimiter,INDEX(value_pre&SPLIT(r,delimiter)&value_after)))))
Usage: append and/or prepend text to parts of delimited texts
Usage_Html: append and/or prepend text to parts of delimited texts

Name: NumParts
Usage: Number of parts in elements of delimited list
Usage_Html: Number of parts in elements of delimited list

Name: Colors
Formula_Html: LAMBDA(data,MAKEARRAY(rows(data),columns(data),LAMBDA(r,c,if(INDEX(data,r,c)="",,SPARKLINE({20},{"charttype","bar";"max",20;"color1",INDEX(data,r,c)})))))(data)
Usage: Convert HEX code to colors
Usage_Html: Convert HEX code to colors

Name: RandomColors
Usage: Generate how_many random valid color codes.
Usage_Html: Generate how_many random valid color codes.

Name: RandomHexColors
Usage: Generate how_many random valid color codes.
Usage_Html: Generate how_many random valid color codes.

Name: RandomEmails
Usage: Generate how_many randomly generated emais.
Usage_Html: Generate how_many randomly generated emais.

Name: RandomTrueFalse
Usage: Generate how_many random true/false values
Usage_Html: Generate how_many random true/false values

Name: RandBetweenArray
Definition: LAMBDA(elements, from, to, mode, if(mode=1, LAMBDA(a,a)(index(int(RANDARRAY(elements)*(to-from+1)+from))), BYROW(SEQUENCE(elements),LAMBDA(r,RANDBETWEEN(from,to)))))(elements, from, to, mode)
Formula_Html: LAMBDA(elements, from, to, mode, if(mode=1, LAMBDA(a,a)(index(int(RANDARRAY(elements)*(to-from+1)+from))), BYROW(SEQUENCE(elements),LAMBDA(r,RANDBETWEEN(from,to)))))(elements, from, to, mode)
Usage: Create a list of random integers on N elements, each of them is between from & to bounds. Select mode=1 to prevent random array from recalculation.
Usage_Html: Create a list of random integers on N elements, each of them is between from & to bounds. Select mode=1 to prevent random array from recalculation.

Name: CrossJoin
Formula_Html: LAMBDA(A,B,c_1,c_2,chr,{ index(split(BYROW(INDEX(ROUNDUP(SEQUENCE(c_1*c_2)/c_2)),LAMBDA(r, join(chr,index(A,r)) )),chr)), index(split(BYROW(INDEX(MOD(SEQUENCE(c_1*c_2)-1,c_2)+1),LAMBDA(r, join(chr,index(B,r)) )),chr))}) (list1,list2,COUNTA(index(list1,,1)),COUNTA(index(list2,,1)),char(999999))
Usage: Multiply 2 lists. Join 2 lists: list1 & list2. This operation is called Cartesian product: set of all ordered pairs (a, b) where a is in A and b is in B.
Usage_Html: Multiply 2 lists. Join 2 lists: list1 & list2. This operation is called Cartesian product: set of all ordered pairs (a, b) where a is in A and b is in B.

Name: Fill
Usage: Fill number of rows and cols with value
Usage_Html: Fill number of rows and cols with value

Name: Group_ItemsCount
Formula_Html: SCAN(0,GROUP_START(data,col),LAMBDA(ini,v, if(v="",, if (v = 0, ini+1,1))))
Usage: Create counter of items of group. Select data and col with group names.
Usage_Html: Create counter of items of group. Select data and col with group names.

Name: Group_Spaces
Formula_Html: LAMBDA(data,col,REDUCE(0,SEQUENCE(ROWS(data)-1,1,2),LAMBDA(ini,v, { if(ini=0,index(data,1),ini) ; if(index(GROUP_START (data,col),v)=0, INDEX(data,v) , {FILL(1,columns(data),"");INDEX(data,v)}) })))(FILTER(data,INDEX(data,,col)<>""),col)
Usage: Adds space between each group. Select data and col with group names.
Usage_Html: Adds space between each group. Select data and col with group names.

Name: Group_Start
Usage: Puts 1 in place of a group start. Select data and col with group names.
Usage_Html: Puts 1 in place of a group start. Select data and col with group names.

Name: Pack
Usage: Pack data into 1 cell with delimiters
Usage_Html: Pack data into 1 cell with delimiters

Name: Unpack
Usage: Unpacks packed data back into array. This function is used in pair with PACK functions. Use it to operate complex calculations.
Usage_Html: Unpacks packed data back into array. This function is used in pair with PACK functions. Use it to operate complex calculations.

Name: Inventory_Balance
Definition: BYROW({ items,SCAN(0, BYROW({items, INDEX(IF(operations=buy_key,1,-1)*quantities)},LAMBDA(r,if(r="",,PACK(r)))) ,LAMBDA(ini,v,if(v="",ini,if(ini=0,v,PACK(QUERY({UNPACK(ini);UNPACK(v)}, "select Col1, sum(Col2) group by Col1 label sum(Col2) ''"))))))}, LAMBDA(r,if(INDEX(r,1)="",,VLOOKUP(INDEX(r,1),UNPACK(INDEX(r,2)),2,))))
Formula_Html: BYROW({ items,SCAN(0, BYROW({items, INDEX(IF(operations=buy_key,1,-1)*quantities)},LAMBDA(r,if(r="",,PACK(r)))) ,LAMBDA(ini,v,if(v="",ini,if(ini=0,v,PACK(QUERY({UNPACK(ini);UNPACK(v)}, "select Col1, sum(Col2) group by Col1 label sum(Col2) ''"))))))}, LAMBDA(r,if(INDEX(r,1)="",,VLOOKUP(INDEX(r,1),UNPACK(INDEX(r,2)),2,))))
Usage: Use to dynamically get the remaining inventory balance of each item
Usage_Html: Use to dynamically get the remaining inventory balance of each item

Name: Query_
Formula_Html: QUERY({data}, REGEXREPLACE(querytext, "(group *by *)( *,? *\d*){0,}","group by "& JOIN(", ",split(REGEXEXTRACT(querytext,"(?iU)select (.*)(sum|avg|min|max|count)"),", "))&" "))
Usage:
Enriches functionality of QUERY. Use shortcut in group by clause:
=QUERY_(C2:E,"select Col1, Col2, sum(Col3) where Col3 > 0 group by 1,2")
Usage_Html:
Enriches functionality of QUERY. Use shortcut in group by clause:
=QUERY_(C2:E,"select Col1, Col2, sum(Col3) where Col3 > 0 group by 1,2")

Name: SplitAsText
Formula_Html: LAMBDA(text,delimeter,charX, index(substitute(split(charX& substitute(text,delimeter,charX&delimeter)&charX,delimeter),charX,""))) (text,delimiter, char(999999))
Usage: Split text as "01-02-03" by delimiter "-" and get the textual output without auto-convrsion of the result to number. Usual split will produce numners: 1,2,3. SplitAsText will give texts: "01", "02", "03"
Usage_Html: Split text as "01-02-03" by delimiter "-" and get the textual output without auto-convrsion of the result to number. Usual split will produce numners: 1,2,3. SplitAsText will give texts: "01", "02", "03"
